GSD.product_version: versions from v3.11 to before v4.14.292
GSD.description:
net: Fix a data-race around sysctl_net_busy_poll.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.292 by commit 7160a9e0fd25d6db6fd0678397846216869743e4, it was introduced in version v3.11 by commit 060212928670593fb89243640bf05cf89560b023. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: Fix a data-race around sysctl_net_busy_poll.
